author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

Title says it:
   * abandon the `getByLabel`event data access in favor of event product tokens;
   * range-based loops;
   * implement `fillDescriptions` method.

#### PR validation:

`cmssw` compiles

title: `Alignment/OfflineValidation`: modernize `EopTreeWriter`
